basics.name: Jessica Lu
basics.label: Professional in and passionate about building executives'/managers' self-effectiveness and people management competencies through public speech, training and/or coaching.

work.summary: Training Facilitator / Executive Coach / Public Speaker
work.desc:
Currently working as a certified trainer for FranklinCovey's signature course of "7 Habits of Highly Effective People" and "Great Leader, Great Team, Great Result"; also as a certified trainer for SHRM Vietnam's SHRM professional certification exam preparation course.
Also a corporate trainer and executive coach through contracts directly with clients or through several training organisations.

Objective:
I would like to contribute my facilitation skills and business entrepreneur experience in helping executives/managers/professionals/graduates to achieve goals and move forward in career path.

Train the trainers; training need analysis; course material and lesson plan design/adaptation; course evaluation and quality assurance; and course delivery

Often invited to speak at seminars or conferences on personal effectiveness, Vietnam labour market status, HR management issues, and entrepreneurship experience.

work.company: IMIV, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
work.desc: Sourcing and selecting trainers; training quality assurance; and training conducting
Performing HR management consultancy; providing training services; and Towers Watson brand building

work.company: Watson Wyatt / Towers Watson Vietnam, Vietnam
work.desc: Managing the operation of 2 offices in Ho Chi Minh City and Hanoi; marketing and brand building for Watson Wyatt (later Towers Watson) in Vietnam; performing HR management consultancy, monitoring remuneration surveys; and providing training services.
Providing Human Resources consulting services in Vietnam; in April, the company was acquired by Watson Wyatt.
In charge of Mercer salary survey and providing HR management consulting projects in Vietnam
In charge of all business support including finance, admin, HR, IT, marketing.  Providing Recruitment consultancy to clients for accounting positions.

work.company: KPMG Asia Pacific Regional Office, Taipei, Taiwan
work.desc: in charge of regional office's all operation support, including book keeping, HR administration, IT administration, branding and regional project coordinating.

work.company: Teacher Lu's Composition Classroom (盧老師作文班), Taipei
work.desc: Providing Chinese composition skill courses for elementary school students from grades 1 to 6.

work.company: Taipei Ming-Sheng Elementary School (台北市民生國小）, Taipei, Taiwan

education.studyType: Continuous Education, Certificate of Executive Coaching
